info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 06 at 9:39AM MDT until June 09 at 11:00AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Montana... Milk River at Glasgow affecting Valley County. For the Milk River...including Glasgow...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Milk River at Glasgow. * WHEN...Until late Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, Some flooding will also occur on area farmlands. At 26.8 feet, Back trail in Sullivan Park begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM MDT Monday the stage was 28.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM MDT Monday was 28.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will remain in minor flood stage through at least Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 28.2 feet on 05/12/2011. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Milk River Glasgow 25.0 28.2 Mon 8 pm MDT 26.2 24.6 20.6 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening by 1000 PM MDT.
